name: GenerateEntityFrameworkMigrationScript
description: Generate a SQL script which can apply migrations to a database
author: Tobania
helpMarkDown: Generate a SQL script file which can apply migrations to a database. The output is the same as the 'Update-Database -Script -SourceMigration 0' command.

inputs.name: Project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project which contains the migrations.

inputs.name: AssemblyName
inputs.label: Assembly Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the assembly type, without the .dll suffix

inputs.name: MigrationsConfigurationTypeName
inputs.label: Migrations configuration type name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the selected project contains multipe DbContexts, please provide the type name of the configuration to use.

inputs.name: configurationTypeSelector
inputs.label: Use configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose how you want to specify your database connection: either through an existing config file or manually entering the connection string

inputs.name: ConfigurationFile
inputs.label: Configuration file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The configuration file to use (e.g. Web.config or App.config). If ommitted, we will attempt to find a Web.config or App.config at the same level as the project file.

inputs.name: ConnectionStringName
inputs.label: Connection string name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the connection string to use. If ommitted, a connection string must be provided

inputs.name: ConnectionString
inputs.label: Connection string
inputs.helpMarkDown: The connection string to use. If ommitted, a connection string name must be provided.

inputs.name: ConnectionStringProviderName
inputs.label: Connection string provider name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The provider name to use in conjuction with the provided connection string.

inputs.name: OutputDirectory
inputs.label: Output directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder in which to place the generated SQL script. Make sure that this is somewhere inside your build artifact folder. The file created in the output directory will be called migrations.sql

inputs.name: OutputFile
inputs.label: Output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the file as which to save the generated migrations
